title: Irakere [feat. Chucho Valdes] - Afrocubanismo Live! (1996)
description:
Ã¢â‚¬Å“Afrocubanismo Live!Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½, released in 1996, features live-in-concert performances from the first Afrocubanismo Festival at the Banff Center in Alberta, Canada in 1994, which have Irakere as the core group, for the most part, with special guests sitting in. 
Irakere is crackling with excitement with Chucho Valdes amazing as usual. The band triumphs through sheer manic energy. Highlights of the album are the spectacular percussion breaks, where guesting rhythm wizards Changuito and Anga strut their mind-boggling chops.
Highly recommended.
